'''Merchant''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{EntityLink|Villager}}, a passive mob who can take professions and [[Trading|sell]] various items for the player at the cost of emeralds and vice-versa.
** {{EntityLink|Armorer}}
** {{EntityLink|Butcher}}
** {{EntityLink|Cartographer}}
** {{EntityLink|Cleric}}
** {{EntityLink|Farmer}}
** {{EntityLink|Fisherman}}
** {{EntityLink|Fletcher}}
** {{EntityLink|Leatherworker}}
** {{EntityLink|Librarian}}
** {{EntityLink|Mason}}
** {{EntityLink|Shepherd}}
** {{EntityLink|Toolsmith}}
** {{EntityLink|Weaponsmith}}
* {{EntityLink|Wandering Trader}}, a variant of villager that spawns at any biome with two trader llamas and sells various natural items to the player at the cost of emeralds.
** {{EntityLink|Trader Llama}}, one of the two llamas that spawn leashed by a wandering trader.
* {{EntityLink|Piglin}}, a neutral [[Nether]] mob that can be [[bartered]] with using gold ingots.

=== April Fools' jokes ===
* {{EntityLink|id=Pillager|Traitor}}, an illager-like villager introduced as part of the [[25w14craftmine]] snapshot.
